The following is the code for the Question 1

```{r}
library(readxl)
library(ggplot2)
library(tidyr)
mydataq1 <- read_excel("./Visualisation_Activity.xlsx", 1)


print(mydataq1)
```

The following are the histogram plots

```{r}
hist(mydataq1$x1)
```

```{r}
hist(mydataq1$x2)
```
```{r}
hist(mydataq1$x3)
```
```{r}
hist(mydataq1$x4)
```

Now, we shall take a look at the box plots.

The following are the box plots.

```{r}
ggplot(mydataq1, aes(x = label, y = label2, fill = label))+geom_boxplot()
```
